entry.title: $2645 // *Long Island City Living!* Lrg Bdrms Lrg Lvng Spce w/ Elev. Ldry Bldg
entry.content:
Make Astoria your new home after seeing this newly renovated TRUE two- bedroom apartment. This unit features an open kitchen with modern appliances including dishwasher, granite counter tops. The living room is a great space, perfect for entertaining your guest or just lounging around on the couch watching television or reading a book. Both bedrooms can easily accommodate a full to queen size bed, plus additional furniture and has a built in closet for additional storage space. Gleaming hardwood floors, marble bathroom, laundry facilities , live in super and walking distance to the train makes this place a must see!

Looking for great food or exotic microbrews? Look no further than Astoria! This northern Queens neighborhood exudes a youthful charm and welcoming attitude. Mom-and-pop shops snuggle up to humble townhouses whose residents address one another by name. With appreciative ease of commute to midtown; under 20 minutes, this laid-back neighborhood's various culinary destinations and quiet streets make it the ideal alternative to expensive city living.

Contact me to view this unit right away!

Christian Robles- Se Habla Espanol
(860)-578-7677

OR

Brian Rainey
(646)520-8945

Contact me for more info.

Additionally, I have apartments throughout Manhattan, Hell's Kitchen, Clinton, Midtown West, Midtown, Midtown East, Upper Westside, Upper Eastside, Chelsea, Flatiron, and Upper Manhattan. Doorman & Brownstone bldgs with outdoor space, patios, balcony, laundry & more. If this isn't your ideal place, let me know and I'm certain I can find it!
